recipe_def.notes: Bootstrap production path for mare regolith using the simple mining process.

steps.notes: Extract ilmenite from regolith; yields generated in process.

recipe_def.assumptions: Extraction yields ~0.6 kg ilmenite per 1 kg regolith input; tailings ~0.4 kg.
recipe_def.notes: In-situ ilmenite extraction from regolith; placeholder yields and mass balance.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for ilmenite extraction from regolith

steps.notes: Collection of carbonaceous chondrite regolith from meteorite impact sites. Rare (1-2% of lunar surface) but critical for carbon and volatile extraction. Slower than generic mining due to site prospecting and travel.

recipe_def.notes:
Collection process for carbonaceous regolith from CM/CI chondrite impact sites.
Targets areas with visible dark material enrichment and organic compound signatures.
Rich in carbon (2-5%), water (10%), and volatiles - essential for ISRU operations.

steps.notes: Extract carbon reductant from carbonaceous regolith feedstock.

recipe_def.assumptions: Carbonaceous regolith feedstock available for small-scale carbon recovery.
recipe_def.notes: ISRU extraction route for carbon reductant; drying and sizing steps deferred.

recipe_def.assumptions: Local production path added; replace import placeholder with real production pathway.
recipe_def.notes: Manufacturing recipe for carbon reducing agent using carbon_reductant input.

steps.notes: Single-step carbothermal reduction from ore to iron pig/ingot.

recipe_def.notes: Direct path from iron ore/ilmenite to iron_pig_or_ingot using the iron_smelting_reduction_v0 process.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for iron pig or ingot

recipe_def.assumptions: Pig iron to steel ingot via refining to billet/slab then casting to ingot.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for steel ingot v0

recipe_def.notes: Alternative canonical recipe using target_item_id format for steel_sheet_3mm.
recipe_def.name: Recipe for steel sheet 3mm (v1)

steps.notes: Mine mare regolith from surface
Screen and separate size fractions
Crush and grind coarse regolith to powder
Extract oxygen and produce metal byproduct via MRE

recipe_def.assumptions: Co-product metal alloy from MRE; refining not modeled.

steps.notes: Cast metal billets for beam stock
Roll to I-beam profile
Machine/cut to length

recipe_def.assumptions: ISRU route using regolith metal; 5% casting loss, 2% rolling loss, 8% machining loss
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant using regolith_metal_crude from regolith. Enables local production of structural I-beams.

steps.notes: Hot roll regolith metal into bar or billet shapes

recipe_def.assumptions: ISRU route using regolith metal; 5% rolling loss to scale and trim
recipe_def.notes: ISRU variant using regolith_metal_crude from regolith. Enables local production of steel bar and billet stock for forging and machining.

steps.notes: Roll billet into bar stock

inputs.notes: Steel billet for rolling into bar stock

recipe_def.assumptions: Local production path; placeholder; replace with detailed BOM and routing as needed.
recipe_def.notes: Converted from import_stub to a local production path using the existing rolling process.

steps.notes: Draw steel rod stock to appropriate filler wire diameter
Spool wire, inspect for defects, package for use

recipe_def.assumptions: Steel filler wire drawn from rod stock to standard diameters for welding and brazing applications.
recipe_def.notes: Basic filler wire for joining operations. Can be used for both welding and brazing depending on composition.

steps.notes: Cut steel tubing or angle iron for frame structure
Weld frame structure with mixer drum mounts and motor platform
Machine motor mounting holes, drum pivot points, leveling feet

recipe_def.assumptions: Welded steel frame for small mixer. Mounting points for drum, motor, and drive system.
recipe_def.notes: Frame structure for small cement or material mixer with welded steel construction.

steps.notes: Cut steel sheet for drum body (cylindrical shell, typically 0.5-0.8 meters diameter) and end caps
Roll steel sheet into cylindrical drum body, form mixing fins and paddles from steel plate
Weld drum cylinder seam, weld end caps, weld internal mixing fins/paddles to drum interior, install mounting trunnion rings
Grind weld seams smooth, remove sharp edges, apply protective coating (paint or galvanizing) to prevent corrosion
Verify drum integrity, check weld quality, ensure proper rotation on mounting points

recipe_def.assumptions: Small cement mixer drum for mixing concrete, mortar, and other materials. 60 kg steel drum, approximately 0.5-0.8 meters diameter and 0.6-1.0 meters length. Capacity ~100-150 liters. Includes internal mixing fins or paddles for material agitation. Trunnion ring mounting for rotation. Used in small cement mixer machine.
recipe_def.notes: Manufacturing of small mixer drum. Total fabrication time ~14.5 hours. Includes sheet metal forming, cylindrical drum assembly, welding of body and internal mixing elements, surface finishing, and testing. Critical component for cement mixer construction.

steps.notes: Machining steel bar stock into agitator shaft and paddles
Cast motor housing; ~5% casting loss
Machine housing surfaces; ~5% machining loss
Assemble rotor/stator with coils

recipe_def.assumptions: Coarse motor build; coils/windings assumed imported for now.
recipe_def.notes: Placeholder route; replace with detailed motor manufacture later.

steps.notes: Fabricate control enclosure from sheet metal
Wire motor control relays, switches, speed controls, and safety interlocks
Mount components in enclosure, install control panel and terminals

recipe_def.assumptions: Basic on/off and speed control for mixer motor. Uses imported control electronics with locally fabricated enclosure and wiring.
recipe_def.notes: Simple control system for concrete mixer or similar equipment. Provides motor control and basic safety functions.

steps.notes: Fabricate mixer drum/vessel and frame from steel sheet, weld mixer vessel/frame/mounting structure, machine drum axle/bearing seats/drive coupling, install bearings/axle/drive motor/rotating mechanism, wire motor controls and safety switches, test mixing action and motor operation, verify mixing uniformity and seal integrity

recipe_def.assumptions: Powder mixer for blending metal or ceramic powders with binders. Tumbler or ribbon mixer design. 80 kg unit for powder metallurgy preparation including tungsten powder for thermionic cathodes.
recipe_def.notes: Powder mixer assembly. Critical for homogeneous tungsten powder preparation in thermionic system manufacturing. Total assembly time ~13.5 hours.
